page.title: 19EDUCATION
page.content: of which 130 are sixth formers. The punishment used is making pupils do extra work or detentions after school or during the lunch hour. {Mrs Hazel Nash the cook}-has worked there for over seven years. Chips and beans are the favorite foods. 500 of the pupils choose to have the dinners. {Greenfield Private School } The school is in converted houses and has two sections, junior and senior. In the junior school there are 165 pupils and in the senior 128. The uniform, I expect you would have guessed, is green. The school uses Woking Park tennis courts and the girls play hockey and go in for many competitions. We asked, if the headmistress could have a wish, what would it be? She said it would be to have the extension they are having built paid for.
